0101000000000000000001000  // Load immediate 8 -> R0
0101000010000000000001010  // Load immediate 10 -> R1
0010000100000000100000000  // Add R0, R1 -> R2
1100000110001000000000000  // Sub R1, R0 -> R3
0000101000001001100000000  // AND R1, R3 -> R4
1011100000000000100000000  // Store R1 -> memory[R0]
1011000000000000100000000  // Load from memory[R0] -> R1
0010001010011010000000000  // AND R3, R4 -> R5
